definition: woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor

James Joyce (1882-1941), Irish modernist writer, author of Ulysses and Finnegans Wake
pinyin: Zhan1 mu3 si1 · Qiao2 yi1 si1

definition: see 詹姆斯·高斯林[Zhan1 mu3 si1 · Gao1 si1 lin2]
pinyin: Zhan1 mu3 si1 · Ge1 shi4 lin2

definition: see 詹姆斯·高斯林[Zhan1 mu3 si1 · Gao1 si1 lin2]
pinyin: Zhan1 mu3 si1 · Ge1 si1 lin2

definition: James Gosling (1955-), Canadian computer scientist, co-inventor of the Java programming language
pinyin: Zhan1 mu3 si1 · Gao1 si1 lin2

sentences.english: Still, the issue James raised back in 1905 remains pertinent.
sentences.chinese: 然而詹姆斯在1905年提出的主题然仍值得讨论。

sentences.english: James proudly sports his new watch.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯骄傲地夸示他的新表。

sentences.english: And BedelL listened as she told him about her brothers and about James.
sentences.chinese: 比德尔也倾听她讲述他的兄弟和丈夫詹姆斯的事。

sentences.english: James continued with her day job until she retired.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯继续白天的工作，直到她退休。

sentences.english: Paul Chambers was on the bass, and James Cobb played drums.
sentences.chinese: 保罗钱伯斯是在低音，和詹姆斯科布敲鼓。

sentences.english: James enjoys the theatre more than Susan.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯比苏姆更喜欢戏剧。

sentences.english: But your father did not love me, James.
sentences.chinese: 可是你的父亲不爱我，詹姆斯。

sentences.english: James comes armed for the Lakers now.
sentences.chinese: 现在詹姆斯有了左膀右臂来对抗湖人。

sentences.english: Eleven-year-old James and his family lived in a small island on the lake.
sentences.chinese: 十一岁詹姆斯和他家人住在湖心一个小岛上。

sentences.english: James Bond is the Hercules or Perseus of the modern age.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯邦德是大力神，是现代的帕尔修斯。

sentences.english: The group decided to stay there instead of trying to find Jamestown.
sentences.chinese: 这队人决定留在那里，不再寻找詹姆斯敦。

sentences.english: Jem hated to be called James. And she always did it.
sentences.chinese: 杰姆讨厌有人叫他詹姆斯，但她经常这样叫。

sentences.english: Neither the twins nor James knows how to spell the word.
sentences.chinese: 对双生子和詹姆斯都不知道这个词的拼法。

sentences.english: I remember James saying something about people who end their lives in caves.
sentences.chinese: 曾记得詹姆斯说过那些死在樊笼里的人们。

sentences.english: James lived on without begging alms from others.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯没有向别人乞求周济照样过活。

definition: Wade (name)/Sir Thomas Francis Wade (1818-1895), sinologist 威妥瑪|威妥玛[Wei1 Tuo3 ma3]
horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
Los Angeles Lakers/abbr. for 洛杉磯湖人|洛杉矶湖人[Luo4 shan1 ji1 Hu2 ren2]
